Key: (There's something I gotta do.)

(I don't know why I feel that way, and for how
long I've felt that way... I can't remember. But
it doesn't matter now.)
(I just have to go.)

(Why I'm feeling like this, I don't know... But I
will run. To... the real place I should be.)

(An inexplicable feeling is making me move. I
don't have enough time... Hurry... I must go as
soon as possible.)
(Here I am... The place I must be. It's...)
Welcome back, Master!
(That's right! The maid café!)

(This comforting moe space. This is my home, the
place I should return to, I don't know why, but I
couldn't stop feeling this way.)
Oh, Shido-saaan!
This voice?
Nyaaaaan, have you come to visit Kurumin again?
Yeah... I've come to visit yet again, Kurumin.

I'm so happyyy. You see, Kurumin really missed
you, Shido-san!
Me, too. I wanted to see you so bad, Kurumin.

(Kurumin... That's right, I remember now. She's an
idol server at the maid café Night☆Mare".)"

Okay, Shido-san. I'll escort you to your
usual seat.

Okay... Thanks. And my order. I'll... have
the usual.
Okaaay. Thank you～

(Phew... Man, you're so adorable, Kurumin. I've
been coming for a few weeks now and finally she's
learned my name. Today... the real battle begins.)

(My love for Kurumin is greater than any customer
that visits her. To prove that, I need to invest
in her. More than any other customer...)

Shido-saaaan. I've brought you some water～
And your order...
The Lovey-Dovey☆Heartbeat Parfait～

(Heh. So you've arrived, Lovey-Dovey☆Heartbeat
Parfait. 1,500 yen. A special item that's fed to
you by the maid. One of my special moves.)
Well, here we go, Shido-san. Ahhh.
Hehe... Ahhh.
Hehehe. How do you like it, Shido-saaaan?

Delicious. It's too delicious, Kurumin. I feel
like even my heart will melt.

Awww, Kurumin is sooo happyyy. I made this
thinking of you.

To think each and every drop of cream here has
been squeezed by you, Kurumin... Wonderful.
This is too good to be true.

Kurumin wants you to eat more～ Open your mouth
wiiide. Hurry, hurry.
Ahhh. Hehehe.
Kurumi-chaaaan. Someone's calling for you.

Awww, Shido-san. Kurumin has been summoned by
another master. Give me a moment, okay?
...What?

(*Grunt*... I guess we can't help it. Kurumin is
super popular.)

(But who would dare to get in my and Kurumin's
way? Who is it?)
Awwww, Kannazuki-saaaan. You've come again?

Ahhh! I've been waiting for you, Kurumin-chan!
Now please step on the parfait with your feet,
and let me lick the back of your shoes!

Okaaaay. Corruption☆Slave Parfait,
coming right up!
(GAH?! What kind of high-level order is this?!)

I'm just amazed that... Corruption☆Slave Parfait
is actually on the menu...

(Damn it... I can't let this happen. I'm going to
have to take action, too... What are you going
to do, Shido Itsuka?!)
Order the Moe-Moe☆Dance Parfait.
Complain to the customer that stole her away.
Bust out my forbidden ultimate trick.

(I know! I'll order more! I'll do that and have
to call Kurumin back.)

E-Excuse me. I'd like to add an order,
the Moe-Moe☆Dance Parfait!
Okaaaay. Would you like to choose Kurumin-chan?
Of course!
One moment, pleeease.
(Hehe... Hehehe. I did it. I totally did it.)

(Moe-Moe☆Dance Parfait is the store's specialty,
where the maid will dance as they serve you.)

(Quite painful to the wallet, but... it's a
service for high-rollers. Totally worth it.)
Yes, Shido-saaaan.

Sorry for the waaait. Here's your Moe-Moe☆Dance
Parfait!
I-It's here...

Hehehe... I'm a little shy, but... Kurumin is
going to dance, okay? ☆
Ohhhh....
Music staaarrt ♪

Today ♪ Another heartbeat ♪ Night☆Mare ♪ I will
kill ♪ my master with evil dreams ♪

She's dancing... Kurumin is dancing...!
Mm...mm...
MOEEEEEE!

Tomorrow ♪ ♪ Nightmare♪ Just focus on ♪ killing
my master ♪

(It's coming... The climax of the dance. The maid
is about to twirl...)

Oh, here I go! Dokhyun ☆ hakyun ☆ twirly-twirly ♪
Dokyun ☆ hakyun―
T-Twirly!
KITAAAAAAAA!
Here we go, twirly-twirly ♪
Twirly-twirly!
Twirly-twirly ♪
Twirly! Twirly!
Thanks for ordering the Moe-Moe☆Dance Parfait!
Aaaaaaaaaaahhhhhhhhhhhhhh!
(God...! I'm so touched right now!)
Awww, Shido-saaaan. Kurumin was so embarrassed.
Kurumin... It was... so amazing...

(Kurumin... She gave it her all... What a nice
girl... And thanks to that...)

(Thanks to that, I totally was able to see it.
...So glad. I'm so glad to be alive...)
Your total will be 7,000 yen!
Have a nice day, Master!
...Phew.
...I wonder why.

...Suddenly a pathetic feeling is welling up
inside me...
And...

What's gotten into me... Clearly something
is wrong...
But... Kurumin was so cute...
(Wait... Why do I feel... like such a loser...)

(How dare someone try to get in my and Kurumin's
way... I'm going to see who it is.)
Hey, you.
Hm? What do you want?

Can you not get in the way? Kurumin is actually
having a really great time with me right now.

Right back at you. Don't get in my way.
Kurumin-chan is my potential queen.
Wh-What exactly are you expecting out of a maid?

None of your business. You still seem to be a
student. But can a young man like you even be
out here past your bedtime?

R-Right back at you. You're like a middle-aged
man, at a maid café at this hour... Aren't you
embarrassed?
Hehehe...
Wh-What is it...?

Yeah! I'm embarrassed! But that's the beauty of
it! Embarrassment is the path to ecstasy. That
kind of corruption is the highway to the climax!
Th-This guy... is not good...

Now, get out of my way. This isn't for a young'un
like you. Kurumin-chan is about to spend some
adult time with me.

Wait. I can't afford to have Kurumin spend time
with a suspicious guy like you.
What?! Get out of my way.
Never...
Grrr, let go!
No! You bastard...
How dare you, you bastard...
GRRR...
HNRRRRGHH...

Here you gooo～ I brought your Corruption☆Slave
Parfait.
AH?!
AHHHHH!
Huh? Oh, ahhh!
Aaaahhhh!
OH!
OHHHH!
Th-That was...?

Her white skin stands out against the
black cloth...
...The black is standing out against the white!

Oh, no, no, you two don't fight over Kurumin ☆
That makes me unhappy ♪ Any master who causes a
ruckus at the café will be sent home, you know?
We're not arguing!
We were just getting to know each other!
We're BFFs!

(...And so this incident caused me and this
somewhat familiar old dude to become friends.
And we spent some hot times at the maid café...)
Your total together will be 42,500 yen!
(...Very well. I had sealed this trick, but...)

(Shido Itsuka. The time to use your Forbidden
Ultimate Trick has come!)

(Hehe. Before I do that, I must explain
what this Forbidden Ultimate Trick is.)

(So, why am I always sitting in the seat at the
back? Because the ultimate secret is here. Hehe.
That is...)
(This seat is near the floor vent.)

(The air system is for the customer and maids to
keep their feet from getting too cold. I've had
my eye on this heater since I first came here...)

(Furthermore, if it's this specific seat, I can
reach out anytime to the switch and adjust
the air flow!)
Shido-saaaan. Sorry for the wait!

(She's coming! Now's my chance! I'm going to crank
the wind power to the max!)
Shido-saaan, let's continue feeding you～
O-Okay...
(That's right. Come closer... NOW!)

Hey, Shido-saaan. Let's eat and talk...
Oh... AHHH!
Nooooo ☆
I did it! The Ultimate Peek-a-boo☆Hurricane!
Aaaahhhhhhh ☆ What's the matter with the air～!
Gosssh... I'm so sorry, Shido-san.

N-No, it's fine. Ugh, that stupid vent. A-Anyways,
are you okay, Kurumin? Haha.

Awww, I'm so embarrassed that you saw that.
Kurumin is sooo hakyuuuun. But now that you
showed your concern, I'm all better.

(Hehehe... Honestly I do feel a little bad, and
it's making my heart hurt... There's still a sense
of achievement inside of me. I... won.)
Anyways, Shido-san. Let's move on. Open wiiide.
Ahh... Hehehe.

(Despite the powerful enemy Corruption☆Slave
Parfait... In a sense, I lost the battle in terms
of investment. But I won the war.)

(I was able to uncover Kurumin's secret black
flower garden!)

Okay, Shido-san. One more bite. Kurumin's parfait,
Moe-Moe☆Dokyun.
Moe-Moe☆Dokyuuun... Muehehehehe...

(Priceless! This is truly priceless! I feel so
satisfied. SO satisfied!)
Your total is 3,000 yen.
Have a nice day, Master!
Phew...

...If you think about it, that was totally sexual
harassment...
